::Shadow Wing::

She noticed that something was different about the place.
"Huh? Oh yeah. I'll go on ahead."
She transformed into her owl mode and flew up ahead.  She spotted the Ark.  
She couldn't beieve her optics.  The Ark was missing part of it's structure. 
  A huge hole had been blow out on the side of the Ark.  The ground all 
around was charred.  Mech fluid on the ground in patches everywhere.  "What 
happened here?"
She flew in for a closer look. A large battle had taken place. She hoped 
that the Maximals survived.  The Autoguns  did not fire on her as she flew 
into the entrance.  She stopped just inside the door way and transformed 
into bot mode.  She took a few steps and drew her gun.  She slowly walked 
down the hallway. She kept out of sight incase someone other than Maximal 
walked by.


---Orginal Message---
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 10:19pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


The sights,filled his optics, the sounds were all around him, echoing
through the trees. The smells of animals he had yet to encounter, but
seemed familiar.He assumed these were the Maximals. He caught traces
of burnt trees, and chared earth from thier previous battles, but
somehow the wildlife didn't seem affected.

"I smell something out of the ordinary."

He didn't know ordinary but he knew what he smelled didn't belong.

How far till we're at the Ark? maybe you should call ahead to be sure.
